Who I Am

Self-learning software developer with an extensive sales and audio-technical background. Currently interning for Yeti-CGI, designing ambient multi-user web experiences using CasualOS (Yeti's full-stack software).

I'm looking to secure a position within a stable and profitable organization where I can be a member of a team, and utilize my experience to the fullest. My fealty for technology, and customer satisfaction, is my leading edge to engineering refined solutions for today's problems.
